briefTitle: A Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Ciclesonide in the Treatment of Non-hospitalized COVID-19 Patients
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Ciclesonide Metered-Dose Inhaler in Non-hospitalized Patients 12 Years of Age and Older With Symptomatic COVID-19 Infection
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of Alvesco (ciclesonide) Inhalation Aerosol in non hospitalized patients with symptomatic COVID-19 infection in a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled study

primaryOutcome.measure: Time to Alleviation of COVID-19-related Symptoms by Day 30
